channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [BOOKKEEPER-364] re-factor hedwig java client to support both one-subscription-per-channel and multiplex-subscriptions-per-channel.
item.description: Currently Hedwig client is coupled with the design of one subscription per channel. In order to multiplex multiple subscription into one channel, it would be better to refine the Hedwig java client code to provide better interface to support both mode.
item.summary: re-factor hedwig java client to support both one-subscription-per-channel and multiplex-subscriptions-per-channel.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: attach a patch to refactor java client, which do the abstraction for the hedwig client. so it is easy to support both one-subscription-per-channel and multiplex-subscriptions-per-channel modes.
attach a new patch addressing Ivan's comments in review board.

HedwigClientImpl uses AbstractHChannelManager, where it should only use HChannelManager. It should be possible for someone to implement HChannelManager without having to extend AbstractHChannelManager and just connect it up to the HedwigClientImpl. Would it be possible to move everything which uses AbstractHChannelManager into a different package (org.apache.hedwig.client.netty.abstract), as at the moment, it's unclear which things are generic and which are tied to AbstractHChannelManager. I would guess you could move everything but HedwigClientImpl, HedwigSubscriber, HedwigPublisher, NetUtils, HChannel & HChannelManager.

Attach a new patch addressing Ivan's comment.

1) move abstract things to client.netty.impl package.
2) move simple implementation to client.netty.impl.simple.

Latest patch looks good to me +1

Running tests. Once they finish, I'll submit, assuming they all pass.

Integrated in bookkeeper-trunk #728 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/bookkeeper-trunk/728/)
BOOKKEEPER-364: re-factor hedwig java client to support both one-subscription-per-channel and multiplex-subscriptions-per-channel. (sijie via ivank) (Revision 1390777)

Result = SUCCESS
